name: Rachel West
text: Working with The Rainbow Balloon Company was awesome! We were needing some centerpieces for our Dunkin' Grand Opening at 2419 Acton Road, Vestavia Hills, AL, and what we got was above and beyond what we were expecting. This is our second time using them for a Grand Opening and a second time we were incredibly happy! The team was easy to work with and they went above and beyond to help us!

name: Jonathan Fudge
text:
The Rainbow Balloon Company is our go-to balloon decor company in Birmingham, Alabama and we absolutely LOVE their work. Whether we are trying to book a client for organic garland or for the every growing in popularity yard decor, they are amazing to work with. I highly recommend them.

They even offer YARD CARDS! We are so excited to have found them and been able to work with them. Our staff ran into them at a convention where the owner of The Rainbow Balloon Company was winning first place after first place awards for her balloons. Well deserved! If you found this company, consider yourself lucky and give them a call. You won't find anyone better in the greater Birmingham area.

name: Cliff Jones
text: I was referred to The Rainbow Balloon Company by a friend and used them for my wife's 40th Birthday. Not only did they do a PHENOMENAL JOB, but their customer service was top notch and everything was handled in a very professional manner!  I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them for any occasion!  You wont be disappointed!

name: Jessica Lee Ramos
text: Jessica and Mary did an amazing job setting up a birthday display for my twin boys turning 10.  They will work with you to get everything just right with balloon colors to coordinate with the yard signs.  Super friendly!  I will definitely refer them to my friends and plan to use them again. Thank you Rainbow Balloon Company!

name: Arturo Briseno Jr
text: With everyone being stuck at home for COVID (so no classroom birthday parties), we wanted to do something special for our little one's birthday this year.  We ordered a Classic Celebration Marquis from The Rainbow Balloon Company and loved it.  They offer different services but for us the marquis was perfect...  something a little different (and in her favorite colors) to brighten up her day.  Highly recommend checking them out!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words! We hope your daughter had a great birthday!!!

name: Julie Bean
text: Fantastic experience working with these fun, talented women! They make the whole process...from planning to delivery/setup....efficient and easy. Their work is beautiful. Highly recommend!

name: Sandra Remington
text: So easy to work with and very responsive! Yard signs and balloons looked wonderful and added such a special cheer to our birthday boy’s day. We will definitely be using them again!

name: Kristin Bundren
text: We love Rainbow Balloon Company! We have ordered from them twice this year (a birthday and New Years) and the balloons were fabulous! The balloon art adds a fun, colorful, and festive touch. Great communication and product! We are looking forward to more in the future!!

name: Olivia Horan
text: If you come to any Diamonds Direct event and see our gorgeous balloon garlands -- these ladies need to get all the credit! Fabulous job every time, and they have a knack for bringing your visions to life :) Highly recommend for any event, big or small!

resp.text: Always a pleasure working with you!!! :D

name: Ashlee Ammons
text:
I found this awesome company after a Google search, I wanted to surprise my Mom with something positive on my Grandmothers 1st birthday following her passing this year.  Although they are known for celebratory occasions they really worked with me to create something with the appropriate tone to make my Mom feel special on an otherwise somber day.  My Mom was deeply touch by this and cried and smiled all weekend long.  The ladies at RBC were wonderful to work with, I accidentally gave them the incorrect address to the house and they communicated with me quickly and got it set and delivered the WOW
as promised!  I would highly recco them, if I need anything further, they will be my 1st call!  Last, they just kinda seem like awesome humans, they were kind, friendly and personable throughout!

name: ShuMarri Jennings
text: They were very professional. They all had great attitudes and the great work ethic. They made sure our event was everything we imagined.

name: Magic City Cheer & Tumble
text: Great company! Easy to work with- gave us exactly what we asked for. Great product.

name: Amanda Austin
text: Very responsive, easy to work with, and did a wonderful job decorating our yard for our daughter's birthday!

name: Deidra K. Diaz
text: I am so thankful I got a Facebook recommendation to use the Rainbow Balloon Company!   Your creativity and decor is SO MUCH better than just having big letters on the lawn.  The custom colors, bright and vivid design and personal touch was exactly what we wanted to celebrate my Mom's 71st Birthday during the Covid-19 pandemic.  I can't say THANK YOU enough, with a special nod to Chandler who was exceptional customer servixe!   Wow...your company is amazing!

name: Ann Katherine Hardeman
text: Excellent service! Amazing balloons!  A pleasure to work with, and so helpful!

name: Steven Hughes
text: This is my next door neighbor.  Nice folks.

name: Brandon Mullins
text: Best balloon designer in the state

name: Steven Hughes
text: This is my next door neighbor.  Nice folks.

name: Brandon Mullins
text: Best balloon designer in the state

name: Ryanne Player
text: They were absolutely amazing and the hit of our party! If there was a design they were not too familiar with, she would google an image and make it come to life!  I highly recommend using them. We will have them back!

resp.text: Thank you very much 😊 we had a wonderful time working with you and your beautiful family.

name: Bre Humphres
text: I hired Pinky Fancy Faces for our real estate event on National Ice Cream Day. They arrived early to ensure they were set-up before the event began. They were very professional and also really great with the kids and adults. I would definitely recommend them to anyone wanting to add a little more fun to their event!

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us.  We had a wonderful time and enjoyed meeting the team.

name: Lauren Lovell
text: Fantastic addition to our son’s birthday party! The children loved the balloon art and face painting. Super talented duo! Can’t wait to use them again!

resp.text: Thank you se much for having us, we had a wonderful time.

name: Rebecca Flesher
text: Wonderful experience! They were able to accommodate my needs and responded quickly to emails. Painter was so nice and great to work with.

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us.  It was our pleasure meeting you.

name: Rachel Miller
text: Nelson was a hit at our twins’ 6th birthday party! His balloons are great, and he was very patient and professional.

resp.text: Thank you for having us.  Your satisfaction is very important to us.

name: Samantha Adams
text: The group we used Pinky Fancy Faces for had a blast! The variety they have with face painting and balloon art is incredible, and they do it so fast! Would definitely recommend for any event, no matter the age! This event was for college aged kids and we all LOVED the face painting.

resp.text: We appreciate the opportunity.  We had a wonderful time working with you.  Thank you and please call us again.

name: William Hamm
text: Amazing, amazing, amazing!!! Can not recommend enough!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity.  It was so fun to paint Christmas designs in July.

name: Shatha Salah
text: Pinky Fancy Faces were very professional and easy to work with. I highly recommend hiring them for your next party.

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us.  It was our pleasure working with you.  Please call us again.

name: Maredith Banks
text: Professional, Talented, First-class service. She arrived early to setup and was able to paint/wow all my guests.   What's more, several people passing by stopped to take notice and asked for a card. I will definitely use Pinky Fancy Faces again!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us, it was so much fun to paint all the Ninja Turtles.

name: Holly Mims
text: We had Pinky Fancy Faces at my son and daughter-in-law's wedding reception and they were wonderful!  It was a huge hit. Most everyone ended up with something by the end of the night.  We had a rain delay and they stayed an extra hour and a half because people were still in line for it.  They definitely went above and beyond.  The price was very affordable as well!

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity, we had a wonderful time working with you.

name: Melissa Diamond
text: Wonderful work!! Loved the designs and how quickly she worked! It was non stop work the whole time she was there!! She was really great and would definitely use her again and recommend her to anyone!! Thank you for making our daughters birthday party so fun!

resp.text:
Thank you very much for your review.
It was a pleasure working with you.
Please keep us in mind for your next event.

name: Michael Askew
text: My daughter asked for a face-painting session with our family (2 adults and 2 children) and this was a wonderful treat. We had widely different styles on each person and were able to find examples we liked online for her to tryout as well. Fantastic job on all of them and my daughter was so proud she made us wear them out to dinner. Give Pinky Fancy Faces a call if you have an event, birthday, or party and they will do a great job!

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity.  It was fun to paint the different designs on your beautiful family.

name: Dena Hawkins
text: Amazing experience with Pinky Fancy Faces! They did face painting and balloon art at my church''s Hallelujah Night festival. Everyone loved their work! We would definitely have them back for future events!

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us.  It was a pleasure working with you.

name: MaryCharles Wood
text: Pinky Faces did an amazing job at our girls joint birthday party! They were so great with the kids and generous with their time! So many parents told me how great of an addition the face painting and balloon animals were to the party! I would absolutely use them again!

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us at your party and for your generosity.  We had a wonderful time working for you.  Please keep us in mind for your next event.

name: Beaumont HOA Board
text: WOW!  What artistry!  Magali is a very talented face painter!  She was so sweet and did something special for each little girl that attended our party.  Very easy to work with and punctual.  I have shared your contact info with many other moms that loved your work!

resp.text: It was a pleasure working with you.  Thank you for having us.

name: g man
text: Would definitely use again. We had face painting and balloon artist at the party. It was a surprise for our new 6 year old. Her and her friends were surprised and very excited. The couple setup quickly, and were very charming with the kids and made them feel very comfortable. I would definitely recommend for anyone wanting to get face painting or balloon artist for their parties. Thank you very much!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity.  We had a great time.

name: Brooke Guercio
text: Pinky Fancy Faces was AWESOME!!! All of the children loved the face painting and the balloon twisting! The artist were great! They worked non stop for 3 hours. We will definitely use them again!

resp.text: We had a awesome time.  Thank you for having us.

name: Nicole Walker
text: Very professional. I was blown away at how fast and beautiful her face painting were. Would definitely be recommending this company.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your review.  It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Bryanna Williams
text: Pinky Faces did an amazing job at my daughters first birthday party. They were on time, friendly & the work was great! I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us at your party. We had a great time. Please keep us in mind for your next event.

name: Jennifer Murray
text: Magali is so incredibly talented and did an amazing job at the Christmas parade. The kids were so excited when they saw the phenomenal job she did on their face paint. I highly recommend Pinky Fancy Faces!

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us at the event. It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Linda Shihadeh
text: We had Fancy Face do face painting and balloon twisting for my daughters 4th birthday. Everyone at the party kept raving how great they were! The face painter was amazing and very quick! The kids (and adults) enjoyed face painting and balloon animals!! Everyone had such a wonderful time!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity.  We had a great time.

name: Rauth House
text: I cannot recommend Fancy Face enough! She is very talented and compliments from our guests were endless! I would refer her to anyone in a heartbeat! We will definitely use her again when we need a face painter!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review, painting everyone's faces was super fun.

name: Kate Lassandrello
text: My daughter requested face painting for her 5th birthday and Pinky Fancy Faces did not disappoint!  Our artist was so professional and the face painting was so detailed!  We had about 15 kids at the party and there was plenty of time for everyone to have their face painted in the 1.5hr time frame.  Would use again and highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us,  it was our pleasure working with you.

name: Claire
text: Great experience!  Used Magali for a 9 year old birthday party!  Would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity,  it was our pleasure working with you.

name: Cooking With Lissha
text: They did our event today for our Fall Festival! She was very professional, fast & such a pleasant person to work with! She is fantastic!

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us, we had a great time painting faces at your party, please keep us in mind for your next event.

name: taryn legvold
text: Did a fantastic job! Super friendly and reasonably priced! They were very flexible as well. Will definitely use again ASAP.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity. It was a great experience working with you.

name: Breanne Linder
text: Mrs. Serrano came to my son’s first birthday party to do facepainting and animal balloons. She was incredible and did such an amazing job! All the kids had a great time and loved having their faces painted. I will definitely be using her again!

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us. It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Kelli Wilson
text: They were friendly and very talented. The kids loved the face paint and the fun balloons. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your review, we had a lot of fun!

name: Felicia Stewart
text: Easy to book, easy to pay, reliable, work quickly, SO TALENTED, unique designs.  Happy kids, happy parents, great event-maker.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity. We had a wonderful time working with you.

name: Aimee Comer
text: Pinky Fancy Faces did an EXCELLENT job for my daughter's party.  She painted 18 kids' faces in an hour!!!  They looked amazing.  We will definitely be calling again for future events.

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us at your daughter's party. It was our pleasure working with you.  We had a great time.

name: Amber Gambrell
text: Pinky Fancy Faces was a hit for my job's family fun day.  Definitely worth every penny!!!  Beautiful face painting for both boys and girls...even adults!  I recommend this work of art to anyone!  Looking forward to booking again next year!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity. It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Jamie McClure
text: We used Pinky Fancy Faces for a neighborhood event and highly recommend them!  Reasonably priced and did a fantastic job!

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us at the event,  we had a wonderful time painting everyone's faces.

name: Candice Beavers
text: I celebrated my daughters 1 year of life and she included 60 of her daycare friends and family. I really LOVED Pinky's service and the children at our church daycare had lots of fun!!! I also appreciate a husband and wife team who has fun doing what they do, all while accommodating 50+ children and grown children :) with face paint and balloon art. Thank you both SO much!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your review.  It was our pleasure to work with you.

name: Tamika Logan Reynolds
text: Pinky Faces was an AWESOME addition to my daughter's 5th Birthday Party. They are an excellent pair and are very talented in their craft. My daughter was so excited and pleased with her face as were the other kids. We would definitely use them again. Thank you Pinky Faces!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your preference. I was our pleasure working with you.

name: Angela Walker
text: For the third year in a row Pinky Fancy Faces has done our End of the Year party for our K4 an K5 classes. She always does a great job. She is fast, on time, and very professional. Most importantly her work is beautiful.

resp.text: Thank you for your preference. It's always a pleasure working with you.

name: Jennifer Griffin
text: Pinky Faces is awesome ... Highly recommend! I've used them for two birthday parties now. Set up is fast, the work is amazing and the kids all have a blast. We will definitely be calling again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the opportunity. Your satisfaction is our priority.

name: Tanisha Snell
text: Pinky Fancy Faces is awesome!! We had a fall festival they did face painting for over 50 children and all of the children loved it. She took her time but everything ran smoothly and in a timely fashion. Everything was perfect and professional. She was also on time and in a great mood! If you are looking look no further Pinky Fancy Faces will deliver!

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us. It was our pleasure working with you.

name: Hilty St. Denis
text: Magali was wonderful! She showed up early and did some of the most beautiful face painting I've ever seen. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity. It was our pleasure working with you. It was a blast.

name: Sabrina Stanga
text: Magali and her husband do amazing work!  They are professional, friendly and talented.  I use them for all of my business and family functions.

resp.text: Thank you so much. It is always a  pleasure working with you. We are looking forward to the next event.

name: Ashley Pate
text: Fabulous!!! Right on time, so sweet, and the designs were wonderful. The kiddos were so happy. Professional work at a great price. Would highly recommend and will use them again!

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity.  We had a great time.

name: Jamie Heidel
text: Magali is so talented and great with kids!! Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity.  We had so much fun painting and doing balloons for your guests.

name: Jazzmine King
text: I hired Pinky Fancy Faces to do a Fall Festival with face painting and a balloon artist. They were amazing and professional. Also, such a big hit and definitely would hire them again to do an event.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity.  It was our pleasure working with you.

name: Ramya Mehta
text: Very professional and wonderful to work with. Kids were very happy! Her designs are amazing. She is very sweet and patient as well.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity.  We had a wonderful time.

name: Mary Glenn
text: Awesome work! Everyone loved the job she did. I got SO MANY compliments for hiring her.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity. We had a wonderful time.

name: M S
text: Very professional! Worth every Pennie! Will recommend to anyone 🙂 Thank you for your wonderful services this afternoon.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity. It was our pleasure working with you.

name: Tiya Mitchell
text: We had my daughters 7th birthday party this past weekend and used Pinky Fancy Faces for both the face painting and balloon artist.   Both were great.  The kids loved both and they were both great to work with.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity. We had a great time.

name: Lynn Brown
text: Great experience and very talented. I would highly recommend to anyone looking to hire someone for their next event or party.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your preference. It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Michael Soeherman
text: They were AWESOME! Very friendly with children and very flexible.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity, we had a great time working with you.

name: Radha Varanasi
text: We had pinky fancy faces do face painting and balloon twisting  for our daughter's 4th birthday party. Every kid enjoyed thoroughly with the face painting and the variety of balloons they had done. They came as family for the party with their kid and it's just not the parents but the kid was so well behaved and mannered. Over all I am 100%satisfied with their professionalism and the art. Would highly recommend them if you are looking for good face painting and themed parties.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity.  We had a wonderful time.

name: Brock Cabot
text: Pinky Fancy Faces were great! We hired them for a corporate event, and they hit the spot plus some. Between baloon twisting and face/head/general painting, all of our guests were blown away by their work and style. If we need a face painter/baloon twister again, I already know exactly who I'm going to call!

resp.text: Thank you very much for having us. We had a wonderful time. We are looking forward to the next event.

name: Jocelyn Hutto
text: They were amazing, they did an excellent job with the face painting the kids got multiple balloons and they were very personable with the kids, will definitely use them again in the future.

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity. We enjoyed the time with the precious kids.

name: Sameer Ather
text: Magali and her colleague provided face painting and balloon twisting at our party. Several guests mentioned that the face painting was just another level!! I recommend their team for any party. Thanks, Magali!

resp.text: Thank you very much for the opportunity. It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Tiara Long
text: We had a wonderful experience with Pinky Fancy Faces at my daughter’s 4th birthday party! The face painting and ballon art was beyond average. Even some of the older kids and adults wanted their face painted after seeing how nice it looked on the kids. I also think that having both the face painting and ballon art really added a nice touch to my daughter’s party. Time management with the face painting was great. Most importantly, my daughter and her guest enjoyed it! We will definitely book them again.

resp.text: Thank you for the opportunity. It was fun working with you.

name: Patricia Flores
text: Very happy with their service. Was attentive with our schedule event confirming and arriving on time. Kids love their painting, balloons and they were very pecient with the children, even when they mess up their art work with water, Mrs. Magali was ready to redo their faces. Pinky Fancy Faces have been coming to most of my children's birthday parties even bringing a special princess for my granddaughters birthdays. Thank you so much.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your preference. It's our pleasure working with you.

name: Whitney Jones
text: They were on- time and extremely efficient! Beautiful designs took minutes and the kids had a blast!

resp.text: Thank you for your preference. We had a wonderful time.

name: Kasey Barton
text: Magali was a huge hit with her face painting! The faces were beautiful and creative.

resp.text: It was our pleasure working with you.  Thank you for contacting Pinky Fancy Faces.

name: Martha Young
text: Magaly is an artist! Parties are not the same without  Pinky Fancy Faces, every painting is very professional and original. My guests  always are looking forward for the next party

resp.text: Thank you very much for your kind words. It is always a pleasure working with you. We are looking forward for the next party.

name: Kari Swenson-Powell
text: Such a talented artist, and very professional. Very happy with the services.

resp.text: Thank you very much. Your satisfaction is our priority.

name: Rick Wright
text: This was a great addition to our event! Very Professional!

resp.text: Thank you for hiring Pinky Fancy Faces. It was a pleasure working with you.

name: Ashley Knight
text: They did an Amazing job @ our daughters birthday party! It was a hit with all the kids

resp.text: It was our pleasure working with you. We had a lot of fun. Thank you

name: sako ak
text: very rood person to deal with not kid friendly

resp.text:
Sorry about your experience. Could you please provide us with more information about the event or date we provided you our services,  we think you reviewed the wrong business because we don't  offer services in your area.
Thank you.

text: Great to work with!
